title: ZIF-8/g-C3N4 photocatalysts: enhancing CO2 reduction through improved adsorption and photocatalytic performance
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17498-17506
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02548B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yihui Sun, Hui Zhang, Yan Lv, Shengli An, Ruifen Wang
This research offers fresh perspectives on the development of effective CO2 photocatalysts, leveraging the synergistic interactions between semiconductor nanostructures and metal–organic frameworks.
